mapper.select: SELECT IDX , PARENT_IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d ") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_BOARD_TB WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT IDX , PARENT_IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_BOARD_TB WHERE IDX = #{index}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIM_BOARD_TB ( IDX , PARENT_IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , WRITE_DT , WRITE_ID ) VALUES ( NULL, NULL, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, 'N', NULL, #{writeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BIM_BOARD_TB SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX= #{idx} AND WRITE_ID = #{writeId}
UPDATE BIM_BOARD_TB SET HIT_CNT = COALESCE(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX= #{idx}
